alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 1:14PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Lafayette, Taylor and Madison Counties through 215 PM EST... At 114 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Quitman to 21 miles southeast of St. Marks. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Perry, Greenville, Lee, Pinland, Jug Island, Ebb, Hamburg, Buckville, Pinetta, Eridu, Scanlon, Lovett, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Foley, Salem, Hanson, Perry-Foley Airport and Hampton Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison
